title: Calories in Philly Cream Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in philly cream cheese per serving, including fat, carbs, protein, and nutrition breakdowns for Philadelphia original.
assumptions: Philadelphia brand original full-fat cream cheese; standard 1 oz (28 g) serving, plain, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, flavor, and exact serving size. Check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One ounce of Philly cream cheese contains about 100 kcal and 2 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror standard Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Switch to low-fat version per oz
Add 1 tbsp strawberry jam per oz

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 oz of Philly cream cheese?
faqs.a: Approximately 100 kcal for the original full-fat version.

faqs.q: What is the fat content in Philly cream cheese?
faqs.a: About 10 g total fat per oz, including 6 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Does Philly cream cheese have carbs?
faqs.a: Very lowâ€”only 1 g carbs and 0 g fiber per oz serving.

faqs.q: How much protein in Philly cream cheese per serving?
Are there lower calorie options for Philly cream cheese?
faqs.a: Yes, low-fat or light versions have about 60-80 kcal per oz.
